showerReviews.reviewText: Stayed two nights primitive camping site #177 and #175 are shaded for most of day only one other site next to you plenty of room for two tents shower restrooms all very clean and in working order nice stay

‚Ä¶ wasn't that much geese residue if you know what I mean laying around. Everyone was having fun it wasn't real crowded and the water was great. The restrooms in the shower areas were very clean. I just wish there were a few more barbecue pits

Nice large sandy beach with plenty of parking. The beach area offered a playground, picnic shelters, restroom and shower facilities. The grounds and building were very well maintained. What a great place to spend tome time unwinding on a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ hot day. Added to the water where you can swim is a playground for kids. There is a rest room area, shower area, and a handicap parking. You can sit anywhere and barbeque and play your music, celebrate birthday and much more. You can also ‚Ä¶
It was nice to go to this place on this hot day , There is a rest room area, shower area, and a handicap parking

‚Ä¶ The only draw back is the cold water shower after a long day‚Äôs swim. Yes the shower is icy cold, but you may decide to take a shower back at home. Otherwise in every respect this is a nice beach for Columbus!
Not well, I car camp traveling across the US. And was very disappointed with no water or access to shower.

Very relaxing the beach area was recently cleaned very quiet for summer. Playground for the kids is nice bathrooms an shower available. Snack machines an soda available. Nice for picnic or walk or just relaxing in the sun.

‚Ä¶ ! There are also food trucks in the summer if you didn't BBQ! Cool summer classic place in the Midwest! It's not Florida or pure Michigan! The water is dirty! They do have showers! My suggestion if you use the water use the shower!! üëå!! ‚Ä¶

The water is sweet, ppl are nice, to see all the families there having fun is a great experience. The park is amazingly fun for the kid's.  There's food trucks, ice cream truck nd bathrooms/shower.
Familyfuntime. Beachtime

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ disgusting. The same poop stains have been on the stalls for WEEKS. The showers are not cleaned because the same debris has been stuck in the first shower stall for MONTHS. Not to mention the counter and table that are never wiped down and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the sauna also smelled terrible. It wreaked in a way it did not before. Between the lukewarm temperature and the stench, I decided to just hit the shower. The showers are also substandard as well, as most of the doors don‚Äôt latch properly, ‚Ä¶

Just plain nasty.
Very dirty and un-maintianed gym.
The same loogey of spit was on a shower wall over 6 months.

Why? The last 30 days there‚Äôs been five days with no hot water in the main shower! Sauna is usually down. Some of the equipment has been broke for several weeks before being repaired. Suggestion call new mechanical contractor to take care ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ on second floor has been broken for weeks. Two of the faucets in locker room...broken. you want a working shower head or door that stays closed, sorry...broken. want a 90 degree locker room because there's "no money in the budget" to buy a ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ relatively quickly.  Cleanliness can be hit and miss but has been better as of late.  Shiwers have been recently grouted now they need new shower heads.  The cardio machines are nice but a couple need to be replaced soon.  Overall I still ‚Ä¶
I am shocked that we are now going on 30 days with no hot water! I always enjoy taking a warm shower after a sweaty workout to prepare myself for work. Not at this gym.

‚Ä¶ my membership. Every time we come inI,  he treats us like family. Sometimes he will come over and talk to me while I'm waiting for my husband to come out of the shower. He is encouraging, conversational, friendly and fun. He is an ‚Ä¶

Esporta shower is mid. It gets the job done, but definitely not my favorite public shower. They had stall doors instead of curtains like Planet Fitness which in theory is better because it's able to lock. However the door wasn't aligned ‚Ä¶
5 out of 6 shower doors broken so they won't stay closed, more than 30 days without hot water, slow to fix broken equipment
